title: Wicker Park bright and sunny 2BR/1 bath. Avlb. furnished. Gas inc
posting_body: Please send over your phone number in your first email and I will call you to schedule a showing.
Lovely Wicker Park 2nd floor apartment, with tons of light, south facing windows, plants, skylights, full kitchen, dishwasher, hardwood floors, tub, and extra living space.
$40 application fee per person, $300 non-refundable move-in fee.
Cats ok with $200 refundable pet deposit.
There are dog aggressive dogs on the property (rescues who are very friendly with people, but will bark at first).
Close to the Damen Blue Line and walking distance to hundreds of bars and restaurants.
Back yard patio available for shared use.
Last minute listing due to tenant's job falling through.
Please send over your phone number in your first email and I will call you to schedule a showing.
